text: Been using this dry cleaning service for the past few months and I’m so pleased with the quality. Was sceptical about using an online service at first, but the customer services team helped me through it all. So far I’ve had no issues, needed a duvet washed within 24 hours and the delivery was still on time. Will continue using spinwash!
Excellent service. Polite and professional drivers. Very impressed with the high standard of service. Easy to use. will definitely be using this service again.
Fantastic. Efficient and well priced. Very useful.
Very good and quick. Would recommend
